short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: An awesome tool to highlight your selections and create email based reminders

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
An all purpose highlighter tool that defines and remembers highlights you have made to text on websites. Will also show the most commonly highlighted section of a website. Your highlights will work cross devices as long as the same google account is used.

In addition lets you set up email reminders for any highlights you have made. 

To use simply hold alt and select some text and off you go!
